column2: Of the many arts unique to the mage, none is perhaps more profound than the crafting of enchanted items. Unlike spells and rituals of power, the crafting of an item creates a persisting legacy of profound capability, capable of being wielded not just by the few for whom magic is a part of their blood, but any with the will and the heart to stand forth.
